mapper.sql: u.id, u.username, u.password, u.phone, u.email, u.created, u.updated
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (username, password, phone, email, created, updated) VALUES (#{username} ,#{password} ,#{phone} ,#{email} ,#{created} ,#{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET username=#{username} , email=#{email} , phone=#{phone} , password=#{password} , updated=#{updated} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user
AND username LIKE concat ('%',#{username},'%')
AND email LIKE concat ('%',#{email},'%')
AND phone LIKE concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
